page.title: 15Employment
page.content: The fourth year junior class consists of thirty three children, seventeen boys and sixteen girls. All thirty three children have fathers that are in employment, and twenty two have mothers who also work. Nine mothers work in the Plympton area. Two mothers work at Plymco super-market. Plymco is situated in the Ridgeway shopping centre. Two mums work at Plessey. Plessey is a factory that manufactures micro electronic components. Three mums work in public houses and one mum works as a dinner lady in a local school. Only one dad is employed in Plympton. He works at the Fire Station in Glen Road. Class 7 Glen Park Primary School
